categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: Resistance Heroes is a canon young reader novel written by Michael Siglain and illustrated by Diogo Saito and Luigi Aimé. The story is set prior to the events of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The book was published on October 4, 2019 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
Meet Rey, Finn, Poe and the rest of heroes of the Resistance who are fighting to save the save the galaxy from the evil First Order.
